text:
The SQL exec task now introduces an additional column in the results.

Eg:- Ant 1.6.5 DB O/p -

     Ant,is,great

     Ant 1.8.3 DB O/p -

     Ant ,is ,great

This is also seen when firing an sql script file. In this result of an enhancement?
creator: sundeep@sundeepmachado.com

text:
The SQL exec task now introduces an additional space before comma in the results

(In reply to comment #0)
> The SQL exec task now introduces an additional column in the results.
> 
> Eg:- Ant 1.6.5 DB O/p -
> 
>      Ant,is,great
> 
>      Ant 1.8.3 DB O/p -
> 
>      Ant ,is ,great
> 
> This is also seen when firing an sql script file. In this result of an
> enhancement?
creator: sundeep@sundeepmachado.com

text:
I have tried the sql task with Ant 1.8.3 and with Ant 1.7.0 and with Ant 1.9.0
I have used these attributes :

onerror="abort" keepformat="true" delimiter="/" delimitertype="row" print="true"

In all cases the fields are separated only by a "," comma without spaces.

I cannot reproduce your issue.

I am marking it resolved, if you have more details you can reopen it, make sure to include a snipped of your build file. Better still you can email the user list with your issue.
creator: antoine@apache.org
